links.title: Apple Supplier Skyworks, Lam Research, Marvell, Teradyne, ASML Are In Buy Zones As Chips Lift Nasdaq, S&P 500 | Stock News & Stock Market Analysis - IBD
links.description: Your stocks to watch are five semiconductors that have just entered buy range: Apple ( AAPL) supplier Skyworks Solutions ( SWKS), Lam Research ( LRCX), ASML Holding ( ASML), Teradyne ( TER), and Marvell Technology Group ( MRVL). The chip sector has been a key reason why the Nasdaq composite has outperformed recently, with the Nasdaq hitting a new high on Friday.
